CustomField.formula: IF(Month_Number__c = 1, December_Target__c+November_Target__c+October_Target__c, IF(Month_Number__c = 2, January_Target__c +December_Target__c+November_Target__c, IF(Month_Number__c = 3, February_Target__c +January_Target__c +December_Target__c, IF(Month_Number__c = 4, March_Target__c+February_Target__c +January_Target__c , IF(Month_Number__c = 5, April_Target__c+March_Target__c+February_Target__c , IF(Month_Number__c = 6, May_Target__c+April_Target__c+March_Target__c, IF(Month_Number__c = 7, June_Target__c+May_Target__c+April_Target__c, IF(Month_Number__c = 8, July_Target__c+June_Target__c+May_Target__c, IF(Month_Number__c = 9, August_Target__c+July_Target__c+June_Target__c, IF(Month_Number__c = 10, September_Target__c+August_Target__c+July_Target__c, IF(Month_Number__c = 11, October_Target__c+September_Target__c+August_Target__c, IF(Month_Number__c = 12, November_Target__c+ October_Target__c+ September_Target__c, 0) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) ) )
CustomField.label: Last Three Month Target
